root.name: The Destiny of Zorro
root.description: OverviewThe setting for The Destiny of Zorro will be placed in the coast and desert landscape of spanish california in the early 1800's. The player is the hero Zorro and has a number of plots to play through suck as taking it up against Calavera and his troops or a power-hungry mob boss, thwarting a plot to steal a great treasure, or facing a a rebel army. The game is a traditional 3rd person action game, with cut-to sections where you use the Wii remote to execute certain moves. The Wii Remote lets the player whip, slice and perform Zorro's signature Z slash move.
